p:
16 CMIP5 models
47 (CMCC-CMS, CNRM-CM5, GFDL-CM3, GFDL-ESM2G, GFDL-ESM2M, GISS-E2-R, HadGEM2-AO, HadGEM2-CC, IPSL-CM5A-MR, MRI-CGCM3, MPI-ESM-LR, MPI-ESM-MR, MIROC-ESM, MIROC5, NorESM1-M, NorESM1-ME) for historical (1950–2005), RCP4.5 and RCP8.5 scenarios (2006–2100) were selected for our analysis. The three variables of interest include Ta, Zg, and SST. From those variables we calculated the FLH atm and FLH SST and their corresponding ELA atm and ELA SST projections in the same way as previously described for the reanalysis products, using the model or reanalysis grid cell encompassing QIC.
